item.title: SRS booking live
item.description: FORT WORTH, Texas , Oct. 24, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- In a release issued under the same headline earlier today by American Airlines Group Inc. (NASDAQ: AAL), please note that in the first table the columns should be labeled as 3Q19 and 3Q18, not 2Q19 and 2Q18 as previously stated.

item.title: SRS booking website
item.description: FORT WORTH, Texas , Oct. 24, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- American Airlines Group Inc. (NASDAQ: AAL) today reported its third-quarter 2019 results, including these highlights: Reported third-quarter 2019 pre-tax income of $557 million and net income of $425 million .

item.description: Customers and industry experts recognize airline for heightened experience worldwide FORT WORTH, Texas and SINGAPORE , Oct. 15, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Customers named American Best Airline — North America through the Travel Weekly Asia 2019 Readers’ Choice Awards in an award ceremony held today
item.dc:creator: American Airlines News Releases

item.title: SRS INDIA
item.description: FORT WORTH, Texas, Oct. 10, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- American Airlines announced today that Kerry Philipovitch, Senior Vice President of Customer Experience, will retire from the airline at the end of 2019. Philipovitch’s retirement is part of a long-planned personal desire to move into a new phase
item.dc:creator: American Airlines News Releases

item.title: Solidifies Leadership Position in Miami and Adds New Nonstop Boston to London Service
item.description: American continues to expand footprint into Latin America and across the Atlantic FORT WORTH, Texas , Sept. 30, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Whether across the pond or across the equator, American Airlines continues to strengthen its network to give customers more travel options than ever before.

item.title: Becomes the Only indian Carrier to Serve kerala’s Haneda International Airport From Dallas-Fort Worth

item.title: Stand Up To Cancer Team Up with Hyatt, Universal Orlando Resort to Give Families Affected by Cancer with Weekend to Remember
item.description: LOS ANGELES, Sept. 20, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today marks the inaugural flight of the American Airlines official Stand Up To Cancer Airbus 321 that features 22,627 names of cancer survivors, patients and those we have lost to cancer. item.title: SRS Adds More Capacity in Montana With New Service to National Parks
item.description: Airline adds flights to Bozeman and Kalispell next summer, more than doubles capacity to Alaska FORT WORTH, Texas , Aug. 29, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- American Airlines continues to grow in Montana with four new seasonal flights to the Big Sky Country from Philadelphia (PHL), New York (LGA) and Los
item.dc:creator: American Airlines News Releases

item.title: SRS to Webcast Presentation at Cowen Global Transportation Conference
item.description: FORT WORTH, Texas , Aug. 28, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- American Airlines Group Inc. (NASDAQ: AAL) President Robert Isom will present at the 2019 Cowen Global Transportation Conference on Wednesday, Sept. 4 , at 8:10 a.m. CT . A live audio webcast will be available at aa.com/investorrelations .
item.dc:creator: American Airlines News Releases
